website_summaries.verdict: The security it offers along with its sturdy build and spacious interior make it the hands-down best choice for storing irreplaceable documents and other items.
pros: Fire-resistant (1550 degrees for 30 minutes) and waterproof when exposed to moisture or submerged
Features a secure clamping latch and easy-to-use lock
cons: It's on the heavy side and doesn't have a handle, which makes it a bit difficult to move
On the higher end of the price range

customer_reviews.title: Might be worth the Hassle...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a dent in the lid (see picture). The interior of the safe is a bit small for standard papers. In addition to this there's a sticker on the top that warns you to place the contents inside an air-tight dishwasher-safe container prior to putting them in the safe, so you will need to fold any paperwork you intend to store in this safe. The label also warns you to air the safe out ever 2 weeks, which I'm certain I'll remember to do... Hopefully this safe will be worth the hassle should the worst ever happen to my home, but until then it's just "Ok".
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good safe for anything but documents.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe for important documents. I wanted a locked box that was also fireproof. I cannot attest to the fire safety of this safe but I can say the 8.5x11 documents do not lay flat. The interior dementions are not listed but are as follows WxD: 12.5inx8.65in. I didn't measure the height because it wasn't one of my concerns. The corners of the base are rounded so documents at the bottom do not lay flat. I returned the safe for this reason. I had no problems with the key and the safe was easy to use. It is a spacious safe and is good for anything but documents.
customer_reviews.author: Casey A

customer_reviews.title: Solid safe, solid price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome safe, good amount of room. I appreciate the button release, so i dont have to keep it locked to keep it sealed. I keep this inside a larger safe. To the people that complain about it being easy to get into, its a fire safe its not to stop burglars its to stop fire. If you want to stop things from being stolen you need a large, heavy gun/executive safe. Like the directions say its a good idea to keep a dehumidifier inside the box or keep keep your things in ziplock bags
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: No handle even though description says it has one!
customer_reviews.text: This does not have a handle. The description for the item says: "It is durably constructed and features a convenient carrying handle that makes it easy to grab it in the event of an emergency." With not handle, in an emergency, you will need both hands to lift and carry this.
customer_reviews.author: John the engineer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was just a little bit larger
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy safe, with good depth to hold contents. Haven't tested how fireproof it is, and will hopefully have no reason to do so. My only issue is that the inner dimensions are just slightly too small. Inside, it is 8.5" X 11", which would seem to be perfect. However, the instructions say to keep papers contained in plastic bags to protect them from humidity. This adds the slightest bit of size, which means that the papers won't be able to lie flat when they are stacked. If it was 9" X 11.5", this would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Crash

customer_reviews.title: I returned it because it was to heavy and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because it was to heavy and the documents had to be bent in order to fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Philomena Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Economical Security and Protection
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye bank safety deposit box. Most of what was stored in there could be replaced if destroyed so there was little point in paying an annual fee that's greater than the one-time cost of this sturdy waterproof, fireproof safe.
customer_reviews.author: value hunter

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Finally organizing my life, fits my 8x10 docs, Colt 1911a and still closes well. I agree that a handle would be helpful. Heavy, but hey, I won't move it much I guess... and do yourself a favor, don't put it by your desk or counter if you have sneaky little dogs. I left mine next to my kitchen counter (my makeshift office) and sneaky chiweenie used it and my Amazon purchased counter-height stool to hop up onto kitchen counter & help himself to breakfast. ;p
customer_reviews.author: ThereSheGoesShoppingAgain

customer_reviews.title: Heavy with no handle. Very little storage space for papers
customer_reviews.text: It looks sturdy. No handle. Very heavy. The keys and user manual are tucked in the foam. It is sturdy but too heavy for me to manage and I hurt my back. I already have a slightly smaller version of this safe. Neither safe holds many important papers. I'm opting to use flame retardant zippered sleeves for the overflow. They will be easier to handle at my age and limited living space. returned this safe today.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 8.5 x 11 documents
customer_reviews.text: All product descriptions say it can fit standard letter-size documents, but it does not. They don't lay flat and will curl on the edges - not something you want to have happen with important documents, such as those you would keep in this fire safe.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I have read reviews which were critical of this item but gave it a shot. So far, I have found it excellent and haven't noticed any issues as far as condensation (though that is perhaps a good sign as it means that it is really well sealed). It has a sturdy catch and I use it to protect passports, credit cards, important documents just in case of a fire. Great to put into a closet but certainly it could be easily stolen as it isn't that heavy. I keep it flat and it is mostly for safety purposes for the most important stuff in case of fire/flood.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Good box but needs a update on style e.g. Handle
customer_reviews.text: The box is solid but heavy. I did my homework on it's fire safety, so I assume it will protect my documents. One key was not good so they sent two more free. I wish it had a handle because it's awkward to pick up and move. Other than that, so far so good ,
customer_reviews.author: Judith Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good item - moisture inside - strange
customer_reviews.text: I read in reviews and the product description about the moisture content in the safe and how the manufacturer recommends airing it out. My mom owns the same safe and has not had any issues with this (we are in the same house) but mine does need to be aired out every once in a while. I had unsealed envelopes that sealed themselves while in the safe which I think is odd. I kept the silica packet that the safe comes with and that seems to help a bit. Other than that the safe works great and seems very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Fagan

customer_reviews.title: The interior dimensions do not fit letter-sized documents without bending.
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a solid water and fireproof box for important documents. I was pretty disappointed that the documents (8.5 x 11) only fit "curled", even though the description claims to fit letter-sized documents. This makes any type of organization (like folders or tabs) impossible, and documents become warped. It is functionality adequate for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Lissenden

customer_reviews.title: Nice Safe reasonble price
customer_reviews.text: This safe does have some weight to it and is not something that is something that one can carry without being noticed. It has enough room to hold the items I want it to hold and still have room leftover. It is not a heavy duty safe, like I used to have, but then again, I did not want to use a hand truck to haul it around. It's a compromise, like everything else in life.
customer_reviews.author: OldnGray

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The item did not come with keys to the lock
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Brickley

customer_reviews.title: hard to comment on this unless there is a house ...
customer_reviews.text: hard to comment on this unless there is a house fire and we see how it stands up. But it showed up as expected i suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It does not handle which makes it very difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not handle which makes it very difficult to move around. Also, the internal dimensions are too small for standard 8.5 x 11 documents!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not have a handle despite what the product description says
customer_reviews.text: It does not have a handle despite what the product description says. This is obviously problematic for anyone buying it because it's supposed to have a handle. I have to give this one star for the inaccurate description. I would have returned it, but apart from being heavy, it came nested in three cardboard boxes, the outermost of which was just too enormous to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: I Do Some Of My Shopping On Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good Affordable Protection
customer_reviews.text: While this is perfect for my purposes I would be worried that someone could easily pick it up & walk off with it. I'm not sure if it can be bolted to the floor or foundation but that would give me greater peace of mind & I'd consider storing valuables in it. I like the ease of the locking system & having a key instead of other forms of unlocking it. I am confident that my important papers will be protected in this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Denise E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The interior dimensions could be a touch bigger. 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: The interior dimensions could be a touch bigger. 8.5 x 11 papers just barely bit at the bottom of the box. They say you should put papers in a waterproof bag, but honestly there isn't really enough room for a bag AND the papers.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Maybe worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on the review from thewirecutter. Its been only a month and so far its working well. Have not had a chance to test it against fire or water, and I hope I never have to. It is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: MRG

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a handle...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty upgrade to our old safe. Good quality. We kept it and rarely have the occassion to move this heavy thing but I do wish it had a handle! Arrived dented in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Fan

customer_reviews.title: Better than competitors
customer_reviews.text: Better than competitors. I'm happy to have the water and fire protection. Don't think it would deter a thief. But then again if a thief is inside your house already, it's too late.
customer_reviews.author: phil_the_thrill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality, wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because I wish it was about one to two inches bigger. It fits 8 1/2 by 11 sheets of paper, but it does not fit hanging files or tabbed Manila files well. Very well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kspence

customer_reviews.title: A Fireproof Waterproof Box
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for what it is—I hope I never tested by having it survive a fire in my home or a flood, or water damage indoors. Can’t speak much about the durability I just chose four stars above—wouldn’t you need to check back in five years? I added an item for scale in photos.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Some personal documents do better in a fireproof safe. No tragedies have happened, but I feel confident enough in the reviews to trust this. Smaller on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: mwstretch

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for us.
customer_reviews.text: This is good item for office small personal/personnel storage. A little difficult to move around which is fine with us. Well packaged, delivered as promised on time locks securely. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: corgi

customer_reviews.title: good size very durable
customer_reviews.text: like the product works well good size as advertised. not going to set it on fire or submerge it to find out how well it stands up I will trust the testing. otherwise, locking mech good and durable. only wish it had a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Zeblives

customer_reviews.title: Not as described - returned
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT have a carrying handle, nor does it allow an 8 1/2 x 11 document lay flat. It seems sturdy. Without handles it is very hard to move around. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Don7A

customer_reviews.title: Much better than what they have at the 'Big-Box' stores
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and rugged but with a finish that won't damage your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Iconofer

customer_reviews.title: Solid & Secure
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a safe to keep important papers and jewelry. This safe is very solid, thick walled, and HEAVY. I am very pleased with my purchase, it was exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Derf Keebslak

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty, sturdy. next cold day i'll toss it in the fire place and really put it to the test.
customer_reviews.author: DrWorm

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Note that papers do not lie flat ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Note that papers do not lie flat in the bottom of the safe as it's just a little tight. But for coins, jewelry, etc, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good unit for the money. The only thing I would suggest is to add a handle or some type of indentation to help pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Ron

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about a year now. Opening it every so often. Still mold. How is this thing still for sale. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty feeling
customer_reviews.text: Like the heft and protective qualities of this portable safe. Great when combined with a fire resistant document bag and placed inside a secure file cabinet or better yet, another safe.
customer_reviews.author: BigFoot

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Great size , excellent made but the company said not to store money or photo's in safe because of mildew. Putting it in large gun safe. Best looking have seen. Comes in excellent packing and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C Cain

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I placed my personal papers in the safe and upon opening the safe later when I needed to retrieve them, the papers were soaked and covered in mold. I even did a test after the incident on a regular piece of paper and within two days the paper was SOAKED and smelled of mold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made fire box. Would have liked it to be just a little bit larger but does hold important papers and small items. Item is very heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Ksm

customer_reviews.title: The product looks good. Not made of cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good. Not made of cheap materials, but wish if the inside dimensions were a bit larger. The size of a file organizer.
customer_reviews.author: T-Wall

customer_reviews.title: Haven't fire-tested it yet. Hope we don't have to.
customer_reviews.text: Seems strong and well built. Hopefully we never have to test the fireproof feature.
customer_reviews.author: Gjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Keys not inside the safe !
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked and opened the safe. There were no keys inside. I called to send back and started to to repack it and found the keys taped to a piece of packing foam. There is no handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: - Fair price - Well built (Its like a tank!) - Very easy to open and close Cons - N/A
customer_reviews.author: QSFYC - Support Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's nice. It's heavy
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. It's heavy. The only drawback is the plastic lock, but I guess if it were in a fire who would care.
customer_reviews.author: Soccal80

customer_reviews.title: Good safe, but could be slightly wider & longer
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have noted, papers (especially in folders) do not lie flat in the box.
customer_reviews.author: AlexLitost

customer_reviews.title: Construction quality = Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. A bit heavier than expected but thats a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Needed by everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid unit for the money and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak Lock
customer_reviews.text: Weak lock, and probably won't survive any fire thats a little too harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, good value
customer_reviews.text: It seems the design was not very thoughtfully executed. it does have go be opened every few weeks and vented—which seems to be contradictory to the usefulness of the safe. but it’s cheap...so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Stock

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Have a Handle
customer_reviews.text: Returning. The last bullet under At a Glance says "Durable composite construction with carrying handle." No handle! I bought this one because I specifically wanted to be able to quickly grab it by the handle and go. It also came with zero keys and no owner's manual. FAIL. UPDATE: the manual and keys are taped to the styrofoam insert.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Blue

customer_reviews.title: sturdy well made safe
customer_reviews.text: looks and feels very sturdy and safe. This will definitely protect my important documents and some valuables
customer_reviews.author: Hansolo22

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to have a handle on it which would make it easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet fits your important items in
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Gave it to my son for Christmas and he loved it and used it right away👌
customer_reviews.author: Judy Joffred

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised. It serves the purpose for what I needed and was looking for .
customer_reviews.author: Tanja Berkhouse

customer_reviews.title: Fits lots of smaller valuables!
customer_reviews.text: Fit everything I wanted. Birth certificates, social security cards, bonds, cd’s, photo’s, etc.
customer_reviews.author: spookshowbaby

customer_reviews.title: We bought it again we were so happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Not to heavy but big enough to hold what I needed it for. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: READ THE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have paid more attention to the reviews. I've had this safe over 6 months and went to add more documents. Instead I found all my items covered in a red and white like dirt. I must assume its mold as nothing else is wet or covered in it. Now my passport is ruined. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Derek F

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: fits under desk and I use it as a foot stool, plus it is the right size for our important papers
customer_reviews.author: constance

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Safe
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected, but still works great! Able to place any documents I want in there. Only negative was the amount of boxes used to ship it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small interior
customer_reviews.text: You're supposed to put everything in a tupperware type container and THEN put it in the safe. And the safe isn't even as big inside to fit an unfolded piece of paper. We have our memory drives, passports and other federal documents in our safe and don't bother locking it with the key. We just want the fire and water protection. We haven't had flood nor fire (knock on wood) yet. I wish the interior was bigger. And I wish it came with desiccant packets.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Day & Webster Ye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe for the price and fits a good amount of valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper Nash

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't have a handle
customer_reviews.text: I had one already but wanted a bigger one. The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't have a handle, but I knew that when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has worked out great so far
customer_reviews.text: Has worked out great so far, bought because it was a top pick by wirecutter. Hopefully never need to test its fireproofing.
customer_reviews.author: LetsTravel

customer_reviews.title: No problems....yet
customer_reviews.text: Good item. Great size. Heavy. Hope it works in a fire - it's plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fireproof and Waterproof storage
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Excellent construction, great room for a paper and media storage. Well worth the $50.
customer_reviews.author: K4M Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good well designed safe for the money. Holds more than one might expect!
customer_reviews.author: S. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: No keys
customer_reviews.text: It has arrived whit out the the key to locked it
customer_reviews.author: Abiud

customer_reviews.title: It holds our important papers but if you need to grab it real quick you better not be trying to take anything else with you
customer_reviews.text: To small and no handle. When I looked at it it looked as if it had a handle...I was mistaken. Three stars though. It holds our important papers but if you need to grab it real quick you better not be trying to take anything else with you.
customer_reviews.author: GorillaKarrick

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good but tight fit
customer_reviews.text: It's a good safe, although it is *exactly* for letter size paper. If you have papers in a folder or envelope, then the only way to fit it in is to have them curled. I bought this rather than the next size up because it said it had a carry handle - it doesn't. So, while it would serve its purpose for holding things like passports and small items, I'm going to purchase the next size up so I have something practical for documents.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Bartlem

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These things a build like a brick poo house, very heavy duty. They only thing I wasn't thrilled about, is the fact that it says to open them up every two weeks, what's up with that? I ended up putting several silica packs in with my contents, by doing that, the two week openings shouldn't be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: FlyfishMontana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size and seems to be good quality. Better lock than the turn latch which doesn't always hold.
customer_reviews.author: kmjen

customer_reviews.title: Needs an extra inch in width, but, doable.
customer_reviews.text: The safe is fine, but I'd like an extra inch in width -- the legal documents I need to store have to be curled a bit to fit.
customer_reviews.author: C.Pell

customer_reviews.title: Works?
customer_reviews.text: My house hasn't burned down yet. The only complaint that I have is that it seemed to off-gas in the beginning. Smelled bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind, just not for burglary.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, solid, seems like it can take a beating. Holds a reasonable amount of stuff. Only thing I don't like is the fact that there are no handles or lips to hold it by. This could be because the company did not want to compromise the fire/waterproof seal of the product, but there are companies who have successfully done this. It's a good thing I have a semi-permanent spot to keep this box in. Would recommend to anybody looking for a basic fire/waterproof box. Definitely not theft-proof though.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great size for home papers. Of course I hope I never find out if it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: jkk5us

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wish this had a handle. I wouldn't of bought if I had known. Good Price and Quality. Will hold what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: I just received the safe. No key was included ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received the safe. No key was included. I have a safe I cannot lock. This was either an oversight or a deep message from the manufacturer as to the value of the contents I was planning to secure within it. Not sure if anyone has had the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: Steve DeLoye

customer_reviews.title: It is a good heavy safe
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. I have no complaints. It is a good heavy safe.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl O. Culver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great safe! LOVE IT... TONS OF ROOM AND GREAT LOCKING SYSTEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA K MCCOLLUM

customer_reviews.title: Damp
customer_reviews.text: While the product itself seems to be fine, the entire inside of the First Alert box smelled like mildew. I opened the plastic packet in which the instructions and keys arrived and it had a definite bad swampy odor. It appears that the item's box was in a poorly ventilated, damp area. Amazon warehouses should think about putting money into adequate ventilation and humidity control.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: came damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product seems fine; it has the amount of space inside that I imagined. It did come with one corner slightly smashed (my husband thinks it won't affect fire safety so I'm not taking the trouble to send it back) and the lock is kind of a hassle to lock and unlock. I think I would go with an easier lock next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jody L. Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came with a huge dent, otherwise I would give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: JDUBBS

customer_reviews.title: A Safe With No Keys
customer_reviews.text: No keys included. Very disappointing. Otherwise looks good,no dents, no smell.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Issues
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped to me twice damaged, and twice returned to Amazon. Both times the cartons had been dropped on at least one corner resulting in dents to the safe. This may be a good safe, but I didn't want to try a third shipment... so I bought a Sentry Large Waterproof Fre-Resistant Chest at Home Depot for 49.99. It's capacity is s little less that the First Alert, but it suits my needs and its not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: JNRS

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Only gave this four stars because, although it is everything I imagined, and I have another, larger version of it, I STILL have to see either of them "tested", in a fire, and with high-pressure fire hose water aimed at it!!! Hopefully, I'll never have to see it "in action".
customer_reviews.author: ChazW

customer_reviews.title: Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a lot. Haven’t tested the fire proofing but it seems that it would hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer

customer_reviews.title: good to have
customer_reviews.text: good one , fits A4 sheets well , good design and sturdy !!!
customer_reviews.author: selvam venkatachalam

product_meta.title: First Alert 2030F 0.39 Cubic Feet Fire and Water Safe, Grey,Small
product_meta.description:
Keep papers and other important items safe from thieves, fires, and floods with the 2030F fire and water chest from First Alert. Featuring a capacity of 0.39 cubic feet, the 2030F is designed to store 8-1/2-by-11-Inch, letter-sized documents and hold them flat. The chest is fire-resistant up to 1,550-Degree F for 30 minutes and has a waterproof seal in case of a flood. A clamping-style latch and key lock further keep contents secure.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Keep papers and other important items safe from thieves, fires, and floods with the 2030F fire and water chest from First Alert. Featuring a capacity of 0.39 cubic feet, the 2030F is designed to store 8-1/2-by-11-Inch, letter-sized documents and hold them flat. The chest is fire-resistant up to 1,550-Degree F for 30 minutes and has a waterproof seal in case of a flood. A clamping-style latch and key lock further keep contents secure.
feature_bullets: Fire-resistant safe withstands temperatures of 1,550 degrees F for up to 30 minutes
Waterproof seal keeps contents dry even when safe is submerged
Large enough to fit letter-size documents
Clamping-style latch and key lock provide extra protection
Fire resistant 30 minutes up to 1550-Degree F
Clamping style latch with key lock

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars208 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
